content.query:
-- Create FactWeather table
CREATE TABLE FactWeather (
 feels_like FLOAT,
 humidity FLOAT,
 pressure FLOAT,
 temp FLOAT,
 temp_max FLOAT,
 temp_min FLOAT,
 wind_deg FLOAT,
 wind_speed FLOAT,
 clouds_all FLOAT,
 date_time DATETIME,
 location VARCHAR(100),
 id VARCHAR(100),
 temp_C FLOAT,
 temp_min_C FLOAT,
 temp_max_C FLOAT,
 feels_like_C FLOAT,
 feels_like_F FLOAT,
 temp_min_F FLOAT,
 temp_max_F FLOAT,
 lon FLOAT,
 lat FLOAT,
 weather_id_value VARCHAR(100),
 weather_main_value VARCHAR(100),
 weather_description_value VARCHAR(100),
 weather_icon_value VARCHAR(100),
 corrected_timestamp FLOAT,
 weather_combined_value VARCHAR(200),
 date DATE
);
GO

-- Insert data into FactWeather
INSERT INTO FactWeather (
    id, date_time, date, location, humidity, pressure,
    clouds_all, wind_deg, wind_speed,
    temp, feels_like, temp_max, temp_min,
    temp_C, feels_like_C, temp_max_C, temp_min_C,
    feels_like_F, temp_max_F, temp_min_F,
    weather_combined_value
)
SELECT
    id,
    date_time,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    location,
    humidity,
    pressure,
    clouds_all,
    wind_deg,
    wind_speed,
    temp,
    feels_like,
    temp_max,
    temp_min,
    temp_C,
    feels_like_C,
    temp_max_C,
    temp_min_C,
    feels_like_F,
    temp_max_F,
    temp_min_F,
    CONCAT(weather_id_value, '_', weather_icon_value) AS weather_combined_value
FROM ExternalWeather
WHERE
    date_time IS NOT NULL;
GO

-- Create DimAirPollution table
CREATE TABLE DimAirPollution (
    id VARCHAR(100),
    aqi INT,
    co FLOAT,
    no FLOAT,
    no2 FLOAT,
    o3 FLOAT,
    so2 FLOAT,
    pm2_5 FLOAT,
    pm10 FLOAT,
    nh3 FLOAT,
    us_aqi INT
);
GO

-- Insert data into DimAirPollution
INSERT INTO DimAirPollution (
    id, aqi, co, no, no2, o3, so2, pm2_5, pm10, nh3, us_aqi
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    id,
    aqi,
    co,
    no,
    no2,
    o3,
    so2,
    pm2_5,
    pm10,
    nh3,
    us_aqi
FROM ExternalAirPollution;
GO

-- Create DimLocation table
CREATE TABLE DimLocation (
    location VARCHAR(100),
    lon FLOAT,
    lat FLOAT
);
GO

-- Insert data into DimLocation
INSERT INTO DimLocation (
    location, lon, lat
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    location,
    lon,
    lat
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO

-- Create DimWeatherCondition table##################
CREATE TABLE DimWeatherCondition (
    weather_id_value INT,
    weather_icon_value VARCHAR(10),
    weather_main_value VARCHAR(100),
    weather_description_value VARCHAR(100),
    weather_combined_value VARCHAR(110)
);
GO

-- Insert data into DimWeatherCondition
INSERT INTO DimWeatherCondition (
    weather_id_value, weather_icon_value, weather_main_value,
    weather_description_value, weather_combined_value
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    weather_id_value,
    weather_icon_value,
    weather_main_value,
    weather_description_value,
    CONCAT(weather_id_value, '_', weather_icon_value) AS weather_combined_value
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO

-- Create DimDateTime table
CREATE TABLE DimDateTime (
    date_time DATETIME,
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    hour INT,
    minute INT,
    second INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

-- Insert data into DimDateTime
INSERT INTO DimDateTime (
    date_time, date, year, month, day, hour, minute,
    second, quarter, week, day_of_week, day_name,
    month_name, is_weekend
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    date_time,
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, date_time) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, date_time) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, date_time) AS day,
    DATEPART(HOUR, date_time) AS hour,
    DATEPART(MINUTE, date_time) AS minute,
    DATEPART(SECOND, date_time) AS second,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, date_time) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, date_time) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, date_time) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO



CREATE TABLE DimDate (
    date DATE,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    quarter INT,
    week INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    day_name VARCHAR(10),
    month_name VARCHAR(10),
    is_weekend BIT
);
GO

INSERT INTO DimDate (
    date, year, month, day, quarter, week, day_of_week,
    day_name, month_name, is_weekend
)
SELECT DISTINCT
    CAST(date_time AS DATE) AS date,
    DATEPART(YEAR, date_time) AS year,
    DATEPART(MONTH, date_time) AS month,
    DATEPART(DAY, date_time) AS day,
    DATEPART(QUARTER, date_time) AS quarter,
    DATEPART(WEEK, date_time) AS week,
    DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_of_week,
    DATENAME(WEEKDAY, date_time) AS day_name,
    DATENAME(MONTH, date_time) AS month_name,
    CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY, date_time) IN (1, 7) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_weekend
FROM ExternalWeather;
GO


-- Create AggWeather table
CREATE TABLE AggWeather (
    date DATE,
    avg_temp_F FLOAT,
    avg_humidity FLOAT,
    avg_wind_speed FLOAT,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT,
    weather_records BIGINT
);
GO

-- Populate AggWeather table from ExternalAggWeather
INSERT INTO AggWeather (
    date, avg_temp_F, avg_humidity, avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F, min_temp_F, weather_records
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    avg_temp_F,
    avg_humidity,
    avg_wind_speed,
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F,
    weather_records
FROM ExternalAggWeather;
GO


-- Create AggWeatherConditions table
CREATE TABLE AggWeatherConditions (
    date DATE,
    weather_main_value VARCHAR(100),
    condition_count BIGINT
);
GO

-- Populate AggWeatherConditions table from ExternalAggWeatherConditions
INSERT INTO AggWeatherConditions (
    date, weather_main_value, condition_count
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    weather_main_value,
    count AS condition_count
FROM ExternalAggWeatherConditions;
GO


-- Create AggTempExtremes table
CREATE TABLE AggTempExtremes (
    date DATE,
    max_temp_F FLOAT,
    min_temp_F FLOAT
);
GO

-- Populate AggTempExtremes table from ExternalAggTempExtremes
INSERT INTO AggTempExtremes (
    date, max_temp_F, min_temp_F
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    max_temp_F,
    min_temp_F
FROM ExternalAggTempExtremes;
GO


-- Create AggAQI table
CREATE TABLE AggAQI (
    date DATE,
    avg_us_aqi FLOAT
);
GO

-- Populate AggAQI table from ExternalAggAQI
INSERT INTO AggAQI (
    date, avg_us_aqi
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    avg_us_aqi
FROM ExternalAggAQI;
GO


-- Create AggPollutants table
CREATE TABLE AggPollutants (
    date DATE,
    avg_co FLOAT,
    avg_no2 FLOAT,
    avg_o3 FLOAT,
    avg_so2 FLOAT,
    avg_pm2_5 FLOAT,
    avg_pm10 FLOAT
);
GO

-- Populate AggPollutants table from ExternalAggPollutants
INSERT INTO AggPollutants (
    date, avg_co, avg_no2, avg_o3, avg_so2, avg_pm2_5, avg_pm10
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    avg_co,
    avg_no2,
    avg_o3,
    avg_so2,
    avg_pm2_5,
    avg_pm10
FROM ExternalAggPollutants;
GO


-- Create HighPollutionEvents table
CREATE TABLE HighPollutionEvents (
    date DATE,
    high_pollution_events INT
);
GO

-- Populate HighPollutionEvents table from ExternalHighPollutionEvents
INSERT INTO HighPollutionEvents (
    date, high_pollution_events
)
SELECT 
    CAST(date AS DATE),
    high_pollution_events
FROM ExternalHighPollutionEvents;
GO
